subject: Reservation Updates
body:
Dear [Client's Name],

We hope this email finds you well. We wanted to confirm the changes you've made to your reservation at [Resort Name]. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we are here to assist you every step of the way.

Updated Reservation Details:

Room: [Room Name]
Check-In Date: [Check-In Date]
Check-Out Date: [Check-Out Date]

Please take a moment to review the above details and ensure they accurately reflect your changes. If you have any additional requests or specifications, kindly let us know, and we'll make sure your experience meets your expectations.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our reservations team at [Resort Contact Information]. We're dedicated to ensuring your stay is both comfortable and enjoyable.

As your new reservation dates draw near, we will provide you with any relevant information to enhance your visit to our resort. Thank you for choosing [Resort Name], and we can't wait to host you!

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Resort Name]
[Contact Information]
Email: [Email]
